content: Forum/Signature Links Link Building By: Rand Fishkin June 3, 2005 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin June 3, 2005 Forum/Signature Links Link Building The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Do forum links carry link popularity? Do they get spidered and indexed by the search engines? Does their anchor text get counted? The answer appears to be no with all of the major search engines. This information comes via a test conducted by Will.Spencer of Digitalpoint, who runs the Internet Search Engines FAQ website. Other tests have been relatively inconclusive in the past, and forum signatures and links still appear in Yahoo!'s linkdomain command with some frequency, but it appears not to have any influence over either SERPs or PageRank. Copied! Back to Top
